channel.title: (3) event∼ on fractal's sound practice

item.title:
Melkhal Pulse:
A Symphony Across Time
item.description: We are going to take over the Melkhal factory on 19 February for a spatial and temporal sound dialogue. Whether you are a visitor, a resident, or a visiting alien, you will be enveloped in the day’s industrial pulse, a milky flow of sound.
